# ADVERT RATING: OUTLIER DETECTION

The following is the code for the Question 1

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(reshape2)

anxiety_exercise <- c(20, 23, 25, 30, 35, 29, 37, 24, 29, 31, 26, 28)
anxiety_no_exercise <- c(24, 35, 41, 21, 38, 23, 37, 44, 32, 33, 34, 42)

set.seed(0)
print(t.test(anxiety_exercise, anxiety_no_exercise, var.equal = TRUE))

```
```{r}

anxiety_baseline <- c(56, 34, 29, 39, 51, 45, 23, 61, 38, 47, 35, 28, 49)
anxiety_after_exercise <- c(23, 25, 25, 20, 35, 39, 21, 50, 34, 40, 34, 21, 30)

print(t.test(anxiety_baseline, anxiety_after_exercise, var.equal = TRUE))



```


```{r}

set.seed(500)
qqnorm(anxiety_baseline)
qqline(anxiety_baseline, col="green")


```
